_header: John and Paul brethren were in the borough of Rome
Title(s): South English Legendary; ‘Seint ihon & seint poul twey breþerin of rome’
Subjects: Paul, saint; John the apostle, saint
_description: ‘Seint ihon & seint poul twey breþerin of rome’, in one MS of the South English Legendary

Bod779.First Lines:
Ihon & poul breþerin were in þe borwȝ of
                    romeþe modir het costande þorw whom hy to þis world
                    com…
Bod779.Last Lines:
…þe vii calendr of Iulie þis cas fel I wisnowȝ
                    Ihesu þorw here bonys vs graunte heuen blis
Bod779.Attributed Title: Seint ihon & Seint poul twey breþerin of rome (f. 216)
Bod779.Editions:
Horstmann,  Carl. 
             “Des Ms. Bodl. 779 jüngere Zusatzlegenden zur südlichen
                Legendensammlung.” 
             Archiv für das Studium der neueren Sprachen und
                Literaturen
         82 (1889): 307-422: 379-81.
